results.prompt: Every time I receive an email in Gmail from 'billing@company.com', automatically apply the 'Finances' label to it.

suggestions.title: Auto-label Finance Emails
suggestions.description: Automatically apply the 'Finances' label to emails from billing@company.com

missing_fields.prompt:
Gmail automation currently requires manual setup through Gmail filters. Please follow these steps in Gmail:
1. Open Gmail Settings
2. Go to 'Filters and Blocked Addresses'
3. Click 'Create a new filter'
4. Enter 'billing@company.com' in the 'From' field
5. Click 'Create filter'
6. Check 'Apply label' and select/create 'Finances'
7. Click 'Create filter'

workflow.name: Auto-label Finance Emails
workflow.description: Automatically apply the 'Finances' label to emails from billing@company.com

missing_information.prompt:
Gmail automation currently requires manual setup through Gmail filters. Please follow these steps in Gmail:
1. Open Gmail Settings
2. Go to 'Filters and Blocked Addresses'
3. Click 'Create a new filter'
4. Enter 'billing@company.com' in the 'From' field
5. Click 'Create filter'
6. Check 'Apply label' and select/create 'Finances'
7. Click 'Create filter'
